topicText:
Morbius delayed 3 months
The Sony Pictures movie - which will feature Jared Leto as the titular Spider-Man villain - is now expected to drop on April 1, 2022. The Marvel motion picture ...
The Morbius movie is being delayed to April
Morbius, the Spider-Man and Venom spinoff starring Jared Leto, has been delayed yet again to April 1, 2022. This is awful.
Marvel's 'Morbius' release date pushed by Sony again
Leto plays Michael Morbius, a scientist who attempts to cure his rare blood disease by using bat DNA, but instead turns into a vampire. The first trailer ...
Morbius Has Now Been Delayed More Times Than New Mutants
Morbius is looking to dethrone the previous king of oft-delayed, troubled superhero films.
Morbius was 3 months late | Movie
“Morbius” is three months late. A Sony Pictures movie featuring Jared Leto as the villain of the famous Spider-Man will be dropped on April 1, 2022.
What Has 'Morbius' Release Date Been Delayed to and Why Has It ...
Jared Leto's first foray into the superhero realm sees him play Spider-Man villain Michael Morbius, a doctor with a rare blood disease that leads him to seek a ...
Morbius release date pushed back to April as pandemic delays ...
Jared Leto's Spider-Man spinoff was supposed to release in just a few weeks.
